plan.summary: Replace bare Exception catch with specific exception types (ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError) to let programming errors propagate and surface bugs early.

tdd_sequence.description: Add failing regression test that passes None to trigger AttributeError - should crash, not return 1
Add test for OSError case (permission denied) - should return 1 with error message
Add test for ValueError case (invalid todo id) - should return 1 with error message
Modify cli.py:124 to catch only (ValueError, OSError, json.JSONDecodeError) instead of bare Exception

acceptance_criteria: Only ValueError, OSError, and json.JSONDecodeError are caught
Programming errors (AttributeError, TypeError, NameError, etc.) propagate and crash
Error messages to stderr remain the same for caught exceptions
